name: OWOCLOCK [Team OWO]
description:
Time is money and unfortunately, Owo is short on both accounts! With too many things to do and being too stingy to afford a proper task tracker, he has to fall back on his trusty alarm clock for reminders. 

Playing as his alarm clock, you'll have to ring at the appropriate times to ensure that he doesn't miss anything. Owo has set each task with a specific ringtone, so ring accordingly when the time comes!

Beware though, should you miss more than 3 tasks, Owo will think you're faulty and put you in the dumpster.

Good luck, you're the only one who can help Owo's day proceed like clockwork!
